Address.label: Address
Address.value: 409 SILVERSIDE ROAD, WILMINGTON, Delaware, 19809, United States

CompanyDescription.label: Company Description
CompanyDescription.value: The Bancorp Inc is a financial holding company, through its subsidiary it is engaged in specialty lending namely securities backed lines of credit, vehicle fleet and another equipment leasing, Small Business Administration lending, and commercial mortgage-backed loans, generated for sale into commercial mortgage-backed securities markets through securitizations. The company deposits and non-interest income are generated in the payments business which consists of issuing, acquiring and automated clearing house accounts. The firm also generates revenue from prepaid cards.

value.name: Gregor Garry
value.title: Chief Operating Officer & Executive Vice President
